title: Safe in the Arms of Jesus
author: Fanny J. Crosby

verses.text:
Safe in the arms of Jesus, Safe on his gentle breast,
There by his love o'er-shaded, Sweet - ly my soul shall rest.
Hark! 'tis the voice of angels, Borne in a song to me,
O - ver the fields of glory, O - ver the jasper sea.

Safe in the arms of Jesus, Safe from corroding care,
Safe from the world's temptations, Sin cannot harm me there.
Free from the blight of sorrow, Free from my doubts and fears;
On - ly a few more trials, On - ly a few more tears.

Je - sus, my heart's dear refuge, Jesus has died for me;
Firm on the Rock of A - ges, Ev - er my trust shall be.
Here let me wait with patience, Wait till the night is o'er,
Wait till I see the morning Break on the golden shore.

chorus.text:
Safe in the arms of Jesus, Safe on his gentle breast,
There by his love o'er-shaded, Sweet - ly my soul shall rest.
